Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
ChannelExpertQualityA class holing the constants with define the detailed (expert) channel quality flags
SpectrumPropertiesRunInfo::ChannelIDA channel identifier helper class. The key in the map
SimpleMapper::ModuleDescriptionInternal helper struct for the value: a module description consisting of
ModuleTypeA class to define the different module types
RunComparatorA class to facilitate the comparison of two runs
SimpleMapperThe SimpleMapper helper class reads in the AHC.cfg text file and provides the mapping (slot, frontend) -> (module, chip)
SpectrumPropertiesRunInfoThe SpectrumPropertiesRunInfo is a utility class to access the spectrum properties for all channels of one specific run
TChannelSpectrumPropertiesUsed to store the channel information (slot, frontEnd, module, chip) together with the spectrum properties (mean, rms) in a TTree
